{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04183v1", "title": "Exponential mixing of all orders on Kähler manifolds:
  (quasi-)plurisubharmonic observables", "summary": "Let $f$ be a holomorphic automorphism of a compact K\"ahler manifold with
simple action on cohomology and $\mu$ its unique measure of maximal entropy. We
prove that $\mu$ is exponentially mixing of all orders for all d.s.h.\
observables, i.e., functions that are locally differences of plurisubharmonic
functions. As a consequence, every d.s.h.\ observable satisfies the central
limit theorem with respect to $\mu$.", "main_category": "math.CV", "categories": "math.CV,math.DS", "published": "2025-05-07T07:29:20Z"}
